metrics.name: correctness
metrics.description: Are all facts, names, roles, version, entities, and relationships exactly preserved and factually accurate compared to the original text, with no errors or distortions?

metrics.name: completeness
metrics.description: Does the rephrased text capture and preserve all critical information, entities, roles, and tasks present in the original input without omission?

metrics.name: consistency
metrics.description: Is the rephrased text internally coherent, with no contradictions, ambiguities, or logical inconsistencies compared to the original content?

metrics.name: relevance
metrics.description: Is all included information strictly grounded in the original input, with no hallucinated, fabricated, or unrelated content introduced?

metrics.name: interpretability
metrics.description: Is the rephrased text clear, logically structured, and easy to read and understand, without altering the meaning or introducing complexity?
